unidue.ub.statistics.stockcontrol

Class StockControlProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.stockcontrol.StockControlProperties

  • public class StockControlProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all the information for the analysis of stock regions.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Eike Spielberg
